name: MTR Round
description: A small steel piece with a plastic tip shapped to resemble a sort of blunt rifle cartridge. For use in MagTech's Revolver Rifles.
//: A MTR Round consists of a solid steel piece which is shaped similar to a rifle cartridge. Important to note these are fairly blunt. A non conductive tip reduces tumble.

name: MTR AP Round
description: A small steel piece with a shapped to resemble a sort of pointy rifle cartridge. For use in MagTech's Revolver Rifles.
//: A MTR AP Round consists of a solid steel piece which is shaped similar to a rifle cartridge. AP rounds are pointy at the projectile tip and lack the non-conductive point so they tumble much more.
